description: [IcedID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0483) can query LDAP and can use built-in `net` commands to identify additional users on the network to infect.(Citation: IBM IcedID November 2017)(Citation: DFIR_Quantum_Ransomware)

external_references.description: DFIR. (2022, April 25). Quantum Ransomware. Retrieved July 26, 2024.
Kessem, L., et al. (2017, November 13). New Banking Trojan IcedID Discovered by IBM X-Force Research. Retrieved July 14, 2020.
